analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.17 (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#7-9): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of ERC20Token.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#61) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of ERC20Token.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ERC20Token.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of ERC20Token.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#87-88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of ERC20Token.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ERC20Token.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ERC20Token.approve (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#104-105) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ERC20Token.approve (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#105) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of ERC20Token.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#111-117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ERC20Token.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of SoulToken.transferSoul (/unique_contracts/0x5bf554632a059ae0537a3eeb20aced49348b8f99.sol#335) is not in mixedCase
